bibl.title: Sappho 88 Voigt (P.Oxy. 2290 + P.Oxy. 4411): a Re-Appraisal.

Oxy. 2290 (a) + (b) 9-17. - 3. New scraps of Aeolic poetry in P. Oxy. 4411? - 4. P. Oxy. 4411 frr. 82 + 58 and P. Oxy. 2290 (a) 18-24.
